description.value:
The stone head piece of this smooth wooden staff is carved to look like a lidless eye. While wielding it, you gain a +1 status bonus to Perception checks made for initiative.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Detect Magic]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sure Strike]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Darkvision], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.See the Unseen], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Translate]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Darkvision], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mind Reading]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Clairvoyance], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Detect Scrying], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Telepathy]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mind Probe], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Scouting Eye]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Telepathy], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Truesight]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
